title: Main Entrance-The main entrance to a plot accommodating a high rise or a special building shall be at least 4
clause_text: Main Entrance-The main entrance to a plot accommodating a high rise or a special building shall be at least 4.5m wide and shall be so designed as not to obstruct easy movement of a fire-engine or truck. The entrance gate to it shall open inside and fold back against the compound wall.
